page.title: 03Housing
page.content: In the area the majority of housing is to be found concentrated in the district known as{Haslingden.}In the outlying areas there are 17 farms. The average age of the houses in the area is 90 years. Most houses are terraced, more people buy their homes than rent them and the average house is Â£14,000. There are 1270 council properties in the Haslingden area, consisting of 909houses and 361 flats. People new to the area have moved there due to occupation or family connections. Some people live here because it is within easy reach of the centre of{Greater Manchester.}
